    public class MainActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    A simple calculator application that can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division on numbers.
    Since:
    version 0.0
    Version:
    1.0 (2021/11/25)
    Author:
    Kien Do, Philip Ostroscki, Jordan Takefman, Isaac Kuruvilla

      • digitBtnClicked

        protected void digitBtnClicked​(int digit)
        Called by onClickListener of number buttons. Updates the display and values.
        Parameters:
        digit - Passed value integer

      • concatStrings

        public java.lang.String concatStrings​(java.lang.String str1,
                                      java.lang.String str2)
        Simply concatenates two strings.
        Parameters:
        str1 - The first substring.
        str2 - The second substring, to be concatenated to the back of str1.
        Returns:
        Returns the concatenation of the two given strings, in the order they were given.

      • equalsMethod

        protected void equalsMethod​(boolean chain,
                            double chainVal)
        This method acts as an equal button Created because btnEquals is not the only button or scenario where this function will need to be used. For example, when the user clicks 1 + 1 + 1, the result will be 2.0. This is because the first 1 gets overwritten when the second + symbol gets pressed. We need this function so that when the user performs the action 1 + 1 + 1, the display should show "2" (and subsequently, val1 should be set to 2) when the second + symbol is pressed.
        Parameters:
        chain - Chain marks if there are repeated operators prior to the equals
        chainVal - Sum to pass through as needed

      • doOperation

        public java.lang.String doOperation​(double val1,
                                    double val2,
                                    MainActivity.Operator op)
        Does the specified operation onto the two given values, to be returned in String format.
        Parameters:
        val1 - First double to be used in the operation.
        val2 - Second double to be used in the operation.
        op - Operator specified to be used on the two numbers.
        Returns:
        String containing the result of the operation on the two numbers.

      • clearScreen

        public static java.lang.String clearScreen()
        Clears all characters and digits off the screen Called by OnClickListener of C button
        Returns:
        returns an empty string.

      • checkLeadingZero

        public boolean checkLeadingZero​(java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Checks if the value in a character sequence is a single leading zero.
        Parameters:
        text - The string to check for the presence of a leading zero in.
        Returns:
        true if it is, false otherwise.
